topic: Bias in Large Language Models and Natural Language Processing

  proposition: Yang Trista Cao et al. studied multilingual large language models and their stereotype leakage across language boundaries.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Yang Trista Cao|RESEARCHED|multilingual large language models
    Yang Trista Cao|STUDIED|stereotype leakage across language boundaries

    entity-entity relationships:
    Yang Trista Cao|COLLABORATED_WITH|et al.

  proposition: Aylin Caliskan et al. discovered that language corpora semantics automatically contain human-like biases.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Aylin Caliskan|DISCOVERED|language corpora semantics contain human-like biases

    entity-entity relationships:
    Aylin Caliskan|COLLABORATED_WITH|et al.

  proposition: Wei Guo and Aylin Caliskan investigated emergent intersectional biases in contextualized word embeddings.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Wei Guo|INVESTIGATED|emergent intersectional biases
    Aylin Caliskan|INVESTIGATED|emergent intersectional biases
    Wei Guo|RESEARCHED|contextualized word embeddings
    Aylin Caliskan|RESEARCHED|contextualized word embeddings

    entity-entity relationships:
    Wei Guo|COLLABORATED_WITH|Aylin Caliskan

  proposition: Jaimeen Ahn and Alice Oh focused on mitigating language-dependent ethnic bias in BERT.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Jaimeen Ahn|FOCUSED_ON|mitigating language-dependent ethnic bias

    entity-entity relationships:
